mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into phy_symptoms_type (SYMPTOMS_PRI, SYMPTOMS_NAME, SYMPTOMS_TYPE, PHY_BELONG) values (#{symptomsPri,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{symptomsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{symptomsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phyBelong,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select SYMPTOMS_SEQ, SYMPTOMS_PRI, SYMPTOMS_NAME, SYMPTOMS_TYPE, PHY_BELONG from phy_symptoms_type

select SYMPTOMS_SEQ as symptomsSeq, SYMPTOMS_PRI as symptomsPri, SYMPTOMS_NAME as symptomsName, SYMPTOMS_TYPE as symptomsType, PHY_BELONG as phyBelong,false as checked from phy_symptoms_type where 1=1
and SYMPTOMS_NAME like '%${keyWord}%'

select SYMPTOMS_SEQ as symptomsSeq, SYMPTOMS_PRI as symptomsPri, SYMPTOMS_NAME as symptomsName, SYMPTOMS_TYPE as symptomsType, PHY_BELONG as phyBelong,true as checked from phy_symptoms_type where SYMPTOMS_SEQ in (${ids})
